message.feriaz.brand: Fériaz is not spelled “AZ” by chance. From the definition of the destination to the customized itinerary, here you have everything you need to plan your trip.
home.cards.first.content: It doesn't matter if by car or plane, in a resort or hotel, for a weekend or for a month, in economy or luxury mode. Here your trip is tailor-made.
home.cards.second.content: From famous cities to less obvious destinations, there is a place that fits your profile perfectly.
home.cards.third.content: We have the best companies on the market and therefore have a wide range of offers.
home.cards.fourth.content: Our artificial intelligence simplifies complex processes so you have a smooth journey and can enjoy your trip from the beginning.
message.feriaz.instruction.caption: How to get Fériaz:
message.feriaz.knowing-pattners.caption: Kown some patners
message.feriaz.gui-detail.caption: Gui takes care of the details
message.feriaz.gui-detail.message: Gui is your tour guide, he will tell you what the best attractions are in your destination, secret tips from experienced travelers, how much each tour costs and much more. Everything personalized according to your preferences and expectations.
message.feriaz.sol-detail.caption: Ask Sol for help
message.feriaz.sol-detail.message: Sol can help you figure out where to go, how to get there and where to stay. She will talk to you and understand the best options for your next vacation based on your expectations and conditions. It even searches for the best deals on the world's main travel sites and organizes everything for you.
message.feriaz.tripplan.caption: Just pack your suitcase and leave the trip planning to us.
